document.full_text: mike huckabee holds a small lead in the field of potential republican presidential candidates, while mitt romney and sarah palin have slipped, according to a gallup poll released on friday.
document.title: huckabee leads republicans for president: poll
lines_and_colors: mike huckabee holds a small lead in the field of potential republican presidential candidates, while mitt romney and sarah palin have slipped, according to a gallup poll released on friday.
